long_description: The Osprey Spin 22 cycling pack for commuting offers padded protection for your laptop or tablet plus plenty of room for other items accessed via a flap-style opening. Includes a built-in rain cover. Flap with hook closure opens to the main compartment that features a padded sleeve for your 15 in. laptop and a separate zippered sleeve for a tablet. Zippered slash pocket on top keeps small items organized and has an internal key clip. Padded mesh back panel provides excellent breathability. Securing a helmet is super-easy and fast, thanks to the LidLock(TM) helmet clip; a bungee on the exterior of the pack allows easy adjustment of the LidLock feature. Integrated raincover stashes away in a zip compartment near top of pack, providing on-demand protection from the elements; cover can be removed to save weight. Reflective trim on the Osprey Spin 22 cycling pack increases visibility in low light; rear-facing attachment point lets you attach a rear bike light (not included). Adjustable sternum strap features a whistle.
short_description: The Osprey Spin 22 cycling pack for commuting offers padded protection for your laptop or tablet plus plenty of room for other items accessed via a flap-style opening. Includes a built-in rain cover.
